text: Ralph Gustav Dahrendorf, Baron Dahrendorf, KBE, FBA (1 May 1929 â€“ 17 June 2009) was a German-British sociologist, philosopher, political scientist and liberal politician. Dahrendorf was born in Hamburg, Germany. He studied at Hamburg University and at the London School of Economics. Dahrendorf was a member of the House of the Lords from July 1993 to June 2009. Dahrendorf died in Cologne, Germany, aged 80, on 17 June 2009, after suffering from cancer. ==Related pages== *List of sociologists from Europe ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2009 deaths Category:British philosophers Category:British sociologists Category:British political scientists Category:German philosophers Category:German sociologists Category:German political scientists Category:Politicians from Hamburg Category:United Kingdom Life Peers
title: Ralf Dahrendorf
